Bills & Budget

👤 Outstanding amount

April 2025

{{ day }}

💳 Credit Card Bills

💳 {{ bill.name || 'Credit Card Bill' }}
{{ bill.category || 'Credit Type' }}
₹{{ bill.amount }}

{{ bill.paidInstallments }} of {{ bill.installments }} installments

🗓️ Due {{ bill.dueDate | date: 'M/d/yyyy' }}

Remaining Installments: {{ bill.installments - bill.paidInstallments }}

Paid Amount: ₹{{ bill.paidAmount }}

💼 {{ bill.name }}
{{ bill.category }}
₹{{ bill.amount }}

{{ bill.paidCount || 0 }} of {{ getTotalInstallments(bill) }} installments

📅 Due {{ getFormattedDate(bill.dueDate) }}

Remaining Installments: {{ getTotalInstallments(bill) - (bill.paidCount || 0) }}

Paid Amount: ₹{{ (bill.monthlyPayment * (bill.paidCount || 0)).toFixed(2) }}

🤝 Personal Loans

{{ bill.name }}
₹{{ bill.amount }} • EMI ₹{{ bill.monthlyPayment || 'N/A' }}
Next Due: {{ bill.dueDate | date }}
